video_caption: The video begins with an animated scene of two characters sitting on a green couch, facing a television screen that displays the text "Mars Saturn & Spica" in yellow letters. The background is a simple blue wall, and the characters are depicted from behind, with one having short brown hair and the other having long brown hair tied in a ponytail. The scene transitions to a real-life setting where two individuals are sitting on a dark-colored couch in a dimly lit room. The person on the left is wearing a light gray tank top and glasses, while the person on the right is dressed in a dark shirt. The background features a plain wall with a visible electrical cord running along it. The video then shows a clear blue sky with three bright celestial objects labeled "Mars Saturn & Spica" in white text, indicating the planets and star being referenced. The video continues with the two individuals on the couch, maintaining their positions and expressions, suggesting a conversation or shared focus on the topic displayed on the television. The atmosphere remains consistent, with the dim lighting and plain background emphasizing the subjects and their interaction.

The video features a man and a woman sitting on a black couch in a living room. The woman, wearing a gray tank top and glasses, is on the left, while the man, dressed in a black shirt and glasses, is on the right. They are both facing the camera, with the woman speaking and the man listening attentively. The background is a plain beige wall with a visible electrical cord running along it. The lighting is warm, creating a cozy atmosphere. Throughout the video, the couple maintains their positions, with the woman continuing to speak and the man remaining still, occasionally glancing at her. The scene remains consistent, with no significant changes in the environment or their actions.
